channel.title: Your best fight stories-
channel.description:
Post your own personal or a friends fist fighting storys! Hell, even feel free to rate other peoples storys. And dont make shit up, its not respectable; even if we cant tell its fake. No one likes liers!
My own personal story happened today at about 4:30 eastern time: It all started about a month ago when a good girl-friend of mine(not dating just friend) came up to me complaining about some kids that were gonna "jump" her at her bus stop, so of corase I show up. Long story short, nothing went down because a lady called the cops on us before I could show the kid some morals. Next day I get called down to the office to have a chat with the deputy and get told that if I lay a hand on this kid without him starting anything first, Ill be arrested for assault.
Present day: For the past 3 days Ive been craving a fight, mostly because me and my girlfriend have been quit pissy lately with each other(I fixed it today after the fight) So i decide to head down to pick up my brother, Patrick from his bus stop with my sister and my girlfriend and it just so happens that the kid who messed with my friend, Malik, rides this bus too. Now i dident come down here looking for a fight, but after I saw him get off the bus (with a little persuasion from his friends cuz I scared the piss outta him last time he saw me about to tear his head off) and him turn his head at me and gimmi the finger I got PISSED. I have some anger issues and I happen to be a big kid(Im 15, 6'1, 180 LBS, and I bench 245LBS) so this wasent the best idea on his part. As he gets off the bus and flicks me off, I look to my left and see my boys walk up to the bus stop just by pure coincidence.(I really dident call them or anything lol) So my boys (Tim, Gabe, David AKA Lucky, Nate, Sailor, Kyle, and the CRAZY ASS Steven.) walk up and ask what going on, So i tell em and basically they say "BEAT HIS ASS" and Im up for it. Malik throws up some gang signs(which if funny as shit cuz hes the perfect example of a wanna be hoodrat in Blooingdale florida aka One of the least ghetto places in the world) and starts walking over and stops about half why to talk some Inaudible shit directed towards us all, And none of us take well to trash talk. Lucky starts to yell stuff at him and says if he wants to fade up hes down for it and i tell lucky "Nahh bro, this is my fight" and he backs down. So I start getting REAL pissed off because i knew what was about to happen and I really start to get pumped up for the fight to come. So I walk until I get about 9 feet away from the kid and he stands there silently looking slightly scared and like hes almost trying to convince himself that hes not gonna get his ass handed to him.(Hes around 5'10, Black, Hood, and a hard looking. But not hard at all) And I get tired of the silence so i decide to talk some shit to really piss him off and to egg him on, so I say "Hey, Im not fuckin scared of you, BITCH" and he says "I aint scared of your soft ass ether bitch" and his calling me soft realllllly pisses me off. Then He makes the mistake of calling me a "Pussy" which to me is the biggest insult a man(If you wanna call a 16 year old hoodboy that) can throw at me. His exact word were "Why dont you shut the fuck up you pussy and get you and your ugly ass girl outta here, Pussy ass Craka!" and he barely got to finish his sentence before his left cheek ate my right fist. I hit him hard enough to knock him off his balance and I hit him another time and he fell on the ground. I had to quickly make a decision as to what I would do so I decided to go with the Ground N' Pound. I Hit him in the face once more before I put my knees on his elbows and hit him in his ugly ass face about 13 times before i moved a bit and let him roll onto his front side, where I hit the back of his head about 5 times(being careful not to knock him out in his tender spot because im not really wanting a court case on my ass lol) before he decided to roll over again to attempt to fight back, but before he could even defend himself I Punched him about 4 times in the nose and once in the cheek as HARD as I could(actually busting my knuckle open on ether his bone or his earring) and he quickly realized that fucking with me was a mistake so he decided to roll on his front once again and just take hits to his back of the head and back. I persisted to hit him another 4 or 5 times in the head and about 3 times in the spine to really make him hurt before he arched his back up, just enough to where I could fit my arms under him and pick him up by his stomach. I picked him up and swung him over my head before I slammed him onto his back REAL hard were he lay for a few seconds stunned at what just happened to him before he Hurry'd up, and once again I threw another punch before he could throw up his stance and fight back and he fell down again(Probably because hes dizzy as hell from being his so much) and I decided that this was enough and that he wasnt worth a criminal record and hospital bills and that if he wanted to get his ass beat more that he would keep on Keepin' on and fight back for the first time in the fight,(not that he dident attempt to lol) and he dident throw any more punches, but pulled out his phone and said "Ni**a, Ima call my cousin any you better fear your life bitch" and I yelled "only pussys jump bitch! if I wanted your ass in the hospital I wouldent need no cousins I fight my own shit!" and as he dialed his cousin, I kept yelling every thin that popped into my head(a lot of which was "PUSSY ASS BITCH!" about 30 seconds later I decide to walk away and leave before I was jumped by REAL hood boys from Clair Mel, but of coarse as I left I just got angryer and angryer and continued to yell stuff. The one thing I remember yelling that really justified the reason I tore him up so bad was "First you called my sister an ugly bitch, THEN you call ME and ugly bitch, and NOW YOUR LOOKIN MY GIRL UP AND DOWN BITCH! YOU BETTER RUN BEFORE I CHANGE MY MIND AND COME BACK THERE!" And I punched a wooden fence which made an extremely loud noise, and is most likely the reason he started to speed walk away(it sounded like a gun!) and I walked by to my house were I took a drink of water, and went back outside to get my girlfriend and my sister and brother and to ask about the fight and to give me details of what happened(if youve ever been insanely pissed like I was and fought, usually you black out and cant remember ANYTHING) and they basically said EVERYthing I just typed out you all you moparians. So now, I am gooing to have to walk around strapped up and never alone for fear of being jumped :( but it was definatly worth the respect and the lesson he learned And if I do get jumped by his cousin, Everyone participating in jumping me will definatly regret it.
Anyways thats one of my 4 fight storys, and that is by far my greatest victory in a fist fight considering he nevewr even landed a hit on me and I landed about 50 on him. Rate mine and share yours, PLEASE!

So I’ve never gotten into a fight.

Probably because I’m 6’3" and 13 years old.

item.title: Your best fight stories-
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“RunesGAYpe, post:1, topic:340941”]Post your own personal or a friends fist fighting storys!
Hell, even feel free to rate other peoples storys.
And dont make shit up, its not respectable; even if we cant tell its fake. No one likes liers!

My own personal story happened today at about 4:30 eastern time:
It all started about a month ago when a good girl-friend of mine(not dating just friend) came up to me complaining about some kids that were gonna “jump” her at her bus stop, so of corase I show up. Long story short, nothing went down because a lady called the cops on us before I could show the kid some morals. Next day I get called down to the office to have a chat with the deputy and get told that if I lay a hand on this kid without him starting anything first, Ill be arrested for assault.

Present day: For the past 3 days Ive been craving a fight, mostly because me and my girlfriend have been quit pissy lately with each other(I fixed it today after the fight)
So i decide to head down to pick up my brother, Patrick from his bus stop with my sister and my girlfriend and it just so happens that the kid who messed with my friend, Malik, rides this bus too. Now i dident come down here looking for a fight, but after I saw him get off the bus (with a little persuasion from his friends cuz I scared the piss outta him last time he saw me about to tear his head off) and him turn his head at me and gimmi the finger I got PISSED. I have some anger issues and I happen to be a big kid(Im 15, 6’1, 180 LBS, and I bench 245LBS) so this wasent the best idea on his part.
As he gets off the bus and flicks me off, I look to my left and see my boys walk up to the bus stop just by pure coincidence.(I really dident call them or anything lol) So my boys (Tim, Gabe, David AKA Lucky, Nate, Sailor, Kyle, and the CRAZY ASS Steven.)
walk up and ask what going on, So i tell em and basically they say “BEAT HIS ASS” and Im up for it. Malik throws up some gang signs(which if funny as shit cuz hes the perfect example of a wanna be hoodrat in Blooingdale florida aka One of the least ghetto places in the world) and starts walking over and stops about half why to talk some Inaudible shit directed towards us all, And none of us take well to trash talk. Lucky starts to yell stuff at him and says if he wants to fade up hes down for it and i tell lucky “Nahh bro, this is my fight” and he backs down. So I start getting REAL pissed off because i knew what was about to happen and I really start to get pumped up for the fight to come. So I walk until I get about 9 feet away from the kid and he stands there silently looking slightly scared and like hes almost trying to convince himself that hes not gonna get his ass handed to him.(Hes around 5’10, Black, Hood, and a hard looking. But not hard at all) And I get tired of the silence so i decide to talk some shit to really piss him off and to egg him on, so I say “Hey, Im not fuckin scared of you, BITCH” and he says “I aint scared of your soft ass ether bitch” and his calling me soft realllllly pisses me off. Then He makes the mistake of calling me a “Pussy” which to me is the biggest insult a man(If you wanna call a 16 year old hoodboy that) can throw at me. His exact word were “Why dont you shut the fuck up you pussy and get you and your ugly ass girl outta here, Pussy ass Craka!” and he barely got to finish his sentence before his left cheek ate my right fist. I hit him hard enough to knock him off his balance and I hit him another time and he fell on the ground. I had to quickly make a decision as to what I would do so I decided to go with the Ground N’ Pound. I Hit him in the face once more before I put my knees on his elbows and hit him in his ugly ass face about 13 times before i moved a bit and let him roll onto his front side, where I hit the back of his head about 5 times(being careful not to knock him out in his tender spot because im not really wanting a court case on my ass lol) before he decided to roll over again to attempt to fight back, but before he could even defend himself I Punched him about 4 times in the nose and once in the cheek as HARD as I could(actually busting my knuckle open on ether his bone or his earring) and he quickly realized that fucking with me was a mistake so he decided to roll on his front once again and just take hits to his back of the head and back. I persisted to hit him another 4 or 5 times in the head and about 3 times in the spine to really make him hurt before he arched his back up, just enough to where I could fit my arms under him and pick him up by his stomach.
I picked him up and swung him over my head before I slammed him onto his back REAL hard were he lay for a few seconds stunned at what just happened to him before he Hurry’d up, and once again I threw another punch before he could throw up his stance and fight back and he fell down again(Probably because hes dizzy as hell from being his so much) and I decided that this was enough and that he wasnt worth a criminal record and hospital bills and that if he wanted to get his ass beat more that he would keep on Keepin’ on and fight back for the first time in the fight,(not that he dident attempt to lol) and he dident throw any more punches, but pulled out his phone and said “Ni**a, Ima call my cousin any you better fear your life bitch” and I yelled “only pussys jump bitch! if I wanted your ass in the hospital I wouldent need no cousins I fight my own shit!” and as he dialed his cousin, I kept yelling every thin that popped into my head(a lot of which was “PUSSY ASS BITCH!”
about 30 seconds later I decide to walk away and leave before I was jumped by REAL hood boys from Clair Mel, but of coarse as I left I just got angryer and angryer and continued to yell stuff. The one thing I remember yelling that really justified the reason I tore him up so bad was “First you called my sister an ugly bitch, THEN you call ME and ugly bitch, and NOW YOUR LOOKIN MY GIRL UP AND DOWN BITCH! YOU BETTER RUN BEFORE I CHANGE MY MIND AND COME BACK THERE!” And I punched a wooden fence which made an extremely loud noise, and is most likely the reason he started to speed walk away(it sounded like a gun!) and I walked by to my house were I took a drink of water, and went back outside to get my girlfriend and my sister and brother and to ask about the fight and to give me details of what happened(if youve ever been insanely pissed like I was and fought, usually you black out and cant remember ANYTHING) and they basically said EVERYthing I just typed out you all you moparians.
So now, I am gooing to have to walk around strapped up and never alone for fear of being jumped but it was definatly worth the respect and the lesson he learned
And if I do get jumped by his cousin, Everyone participating in jumping me will definatly regret it.

Anyways thats one of my 4 fight storys, and that is by far my greatest victory in a fist fight considering he nevewr even landed a hit on me and I landed about 50 on him.
Rate mine and share yours, PLEASE![/quote]

Do you really expect anyone to read all that?
